label: Prompt 1
prompt:
A minimalist, modern, and clean invoice document rendered as a clean, digital printout.
Key Features to Include:
Structure & Layout: The invoice must be contained within a centered, elevated white rectangle with slightly rounded corners, mimicking a document structure. The overall aesthetic should be professional and spacious.
Header:
On the top left, the company logo should appear as the text: "YourLogo.co" where "YourLogo" is bold/darker and ".co" is lighter/subdued.
On the top right, the invoice title should be clearly visible:
The word "INVOICE" in light gray, uppercase, and a slightly smaller font.
Below it, the text "#INV-XXXXX" in a darker gray.
Main Content Area (Invoice Totals Section): A large empty section in the middle/upper-middle of the page, where the invoice-totals would be. This area should occupy approximately 40% of the document's height, positioned to the right side to reflect justify-content: flex-end.
Footer:
A light gray, thin horizontal line should separate the footer from the main content.
Centered at the bottom, the faint gray text: "Thank you for your business! Payment is due within 30 days."
Style & Color Palette (referencing bill-skeleton.scss):
Background: Off-white or very light gray.
Document: Pure White (#ffffff) background with a soft, subtle shadow (box-shadow: 0 10px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)) and a thin, light border (#e9ecef).
Colors: Use a minimal palette:
Primary Text: Very Dark Gray/Black (#212529).
Subtle/Accent Text (Invoice Title): Light to Medium Gray (#adb5bd, #6c757d).
Dividers: Light Gray (#dee2e6, #e9ecef).
Perspective: Flat, straight-on view, as if looking at a printed document on a desk.

label: Prompt 2
prompt: Style & Context: "A photorealistic, vertical, digital printout of a minimalist, modern invoice document. The final image should be a flat, straight-on view, as if the document is resting on a clean, off-white surface. The style must be clean, precise, and devoid of any extra graphic elements, icons, or unnecessary lines."|||Document Structure (Enforcing HTML/SCSS Layout): "The entire invoice content must be contained within a single, centered Pure White (#ffffff) rectangle. This white document has slightly rounded corners, a thin Light Border (#e9ecef), and a subtle, soft, blurred shadow (box-shadow: 0 10px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)), giving it a raised, elevated appearance."|||Header Section (Enforcing invoice-header layout): "The top section is divided into two parts, separated by a thin, medium gray horizontal line (#dee2e6) across the full width. Left Side (Company Logo): Display the text 'YourLogo.co'. The word 'YourLogo' is bold, using Very Dark Gray (#212529). The suffix '.co' is lighter and subdued, using a Medium Gray (#495057). Right Side (Invoice Title): Text must be perfectly right-aligned. The main word is 'INVOICE' in Light Gray (#adb5bd), uppercase, and a slightly smaller font. Below it, the invoice number '#INV-XXXXX' is displayed in a Darker Gray (#6c757d)."|||Totals Section (Enforcing justify-content: flex-end): "The middle section must contain a large, empty area for line items. Crucially, the Invoice Totals section (the main calculation block) is positioned and strictly aligned to the far right edge of the page, occupying approximately 40% of the document width, leaving the left side blank, exactly as if using justify-content: flex-end."|||Footer Section (Enforcing invoice-footer style): "At the very bottom, a faint, thin, light gray horizontal line separates the main content from the footer. The text 'Thank you for your business! Payment is due within 30 days.' must be centered and rendered in a faint, light gray text (#adb5bd)."|||Summary of Colors (Strictly enforced): "Use only the following limited color palette: Pure White (#ffffff) for the background of the document; Very Dark Gray/Black (#212529) for primary text; Medium Gray (#495057) and Darker Gray (#6c757d) for subtle text and secondary elements; Light Gray (#adb5bd) for titles and faint accents; and very light gray lines (#e9ecef, #dee2e6) for borders."
